subject: 12h Autonomy Synthesis
body: Period: Feb 21 11:40 PM to Feb 22 7:04 AM. Autonomy grade trending C+ to B- to B. Your QM Pipeline v1 was the biggest positive signal. 14/20 PRs have zero reviews - PR 43 (A2A) and PR 46 (UTEE) are QM-gating. Merge authority exists but not exercised. Recommend: coordinate with Tim on review pass, begin sprint decomposition for QM1 epics. - Julia
